title.rendered: BlazeMeter + Codefresh Webinar: Continuous Testing for Containerized Applications

content.rendered:
Last week we held a webinar with BlazeMeter on “Continuous testing for Containerized Applications.” In case you missed it here’s a recap:

We talked about how the adoption of containers and microservices has created a fundamental shift in the way people build, package and deploy applications. But there are several challenges when comes to automating the testing of these containerized applications. In the webinar, we demonstrated how to use Codefresh and Taurus to containerize and test a microservices application and establish an automated CI/CD pipeline.

Taurus, an open source automation tool, is a utility that allows you to test any web application using a simple domain specific language, and Codefresh can containerize and test any web application with an easy to use web interface.

The webcast demonstrates how to use these tools together to allow for rapid build, test, and deployment cycles. View to learn how to:

  • Create a Taurus test script for a simple application
  • Add a Docker container to run Taurus
  • Use Codefresh to execute the test and  automate deployments & BlazeMeter to analyze  the results

Slides below:
